thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Northern Oil And Gas Announces Accretive Acquisition In The Core Of The Williston Basin

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Northern Oil And Gas Announces Accretive Acquisition In The Core Of The Williston Basin
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Northern Oil and Gas Inc:
* NORTHERN OIL AND GAS, INC. ANNOUNCES ACCRETIVE ACQUISITION IN THE CORE OF THE WILLISTON BASIN
* NORTHERN OIL AND GAS INC - DEAL FOR $40 MILLION IN CASH
* NORTHERN OIL AND GAS INC - DEAL ALSO INCLUDES 6 MILLION SHARES OF NORTHERN COMMON STOCK
* NORTHERN OIL AND GAS - EXPECTS ACQUIRED PROPERTIES TO GENERATE ABOUT $19 MILLION OF CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS IN 2018
* NORTHERN OIL AND GAS - POTENTIAL FOR ADDITIONAL CASH CONSIDERATION PAID AT END OF 6-MONTH LOCKUP PERIOD IF COâ€™S STOCK TRADING BELOW $2/SHARE Source text for Eikon:
